description: Number of proper linear spaces of order n.
references: A. Betten and D. Betten: The proper linear spaces on 17 points, Discrete Applied Mathematics, Volume 95, no. 1-3, 1999, pp. 83-108.
A. Betten and D. Betten: Note on the Proper Linear Spaces on 18 Points, in "Algebraic Combinatorics and Applications", Springer, 2001, pp. 40-54.
CRC Handbook of Combinatorial Designs, 1996, in the article by Gronau, Mullin and Pietsch, page 216 (but beware errors).
links: A. Betten and D. Betten, Data up to 18 points
author: Anton Betten (Anton.Betten(AT)uni-bayreuth.de)
